marker.ph:
<<ContentPage.ToolbarItems> <ToolbarItem Name="Clear" Order="Primary" Text="Clear" Priority="0" Activated="Clear_Activated"/> </ContentPage.ToolbarItems> <ScrollView> <Grid RowSpacing="7" ColumnSpacing="10" HorizontalOptions="FillAndExpand" VerticalOptions="FillAndExpand"> <Grid.RowDefinitions> <RowDefinition Height="AUTO" /> <RowDefinition Height="AUTO" /> <RowDefinition Height="AUTO" /> <RowDefinition Height="AUTO" /> <RowDefinition Height="AUTO" /> <RowDefinition Height="AUTO" /> <RowDefinition Height="AUTO" /> <RowDefinition Height="*" /> </Grid.RowDefinitions> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*"/> <ColumnDefinition Width="5*"/> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions>
<!-- Copper --> <BoxView BackgroundColor="White" Opacity="0.10" Grid.Row="1" HeightRequest="55" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <Label Text="Copper" TextColor="##ffffff" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="0" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" TranslationX="30" Font="16" /> <Entry x:Name="copperEntry" Placeholder="0" Keyboard="Numeric" Grid.Row="1" Grid.Column="1" TranslationX="15" TextColor="White" />
<!-- Silver --> <BoxView BackgroundColor="White" Opacity="0.10" Grid.Row="2" HeightRequest="55" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <Label Text="Silver" TextColor="##ffffff" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="0" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" TranslationX="30" Font="16"/> <Entry x:Name="silverEntry" Placeholder="0" Keyboard="Numeric" Grid.Row="2" Grid.Column="1" TranslationX="15" TextColor="White" />
<!-- Electrum --> <BoxView BackgroundColor="White" Opacity="0.10" Grid.Row="3" HeightRequest="55" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <Label Text="Electrum" TextColor="##ffffff" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="0" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" TranslationX="30" Font="16"/> <Entry x:Name="electrumEntry" Placeholder="0" Keyboard="Numeric" Grid.Row="3" Grid.Column="1" TranslationX="15" TextColor="White" />
<!-- Gold --> <BoxView BackgroundColor="White" Opacity="0.10" Grid.Row="4" HeightRequest="55" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <Label Text="Gold" TextColor="##ffffff" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="0" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" TranslationX="30" Font="16"/> <Entry x:Name="goldEntry" Placeholder="0" Keyboard="Numeric" Grid.Row="4" Grid.Column="1" TranslationX="15" TextColor="White" />
<!-- Platinum --> <BoxView BackgroundColor="White" Opacity="0.10" Grid.Row="5" HeightRequest="55" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <Label Text="Platinum" TextColor="##ffffff" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="0" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" TranslationX="30" Font="16"/> <Entry x:Name="platinumEntry" Placeholder="0" Keyboard="Numeric" Grid.Row="5" Grid.Column="1" TranslationX="15" TextColor="White" />
<!-- Team Size --> <BoxView BackgroundColor="White" Opacity="0.10" Grid.Row="6" HeightRequest="55" Grid.ColumnSpan="2"/> <Label Text="Team size" TextColor="##ffffff" Grid.Row="6" Grid.Column="0" VerticalTextAlignment="Center" TranslationX="30" Font="16"/> <Entry x:Name="teamSizeEntry" Placeholder="Optional" Keyboard="Numeric" Grid.Row="6" Grid.Column="1" TranslationX="15" TextColor="White" />
<!-- Calculate --> <BoxView BackgroundColor="White" Opacity="0.10" Grid.Row="7" Grid.ColumnSpan="2" HeightRequest="70" /> <Button Clicked="RecalculateResult" Grid.Row="7" Grid.ColumnSpan="2" Text="Calculate" HorizontalOptions="Center" VerticalOptions="Center" HeightRequest="40" WidthRequest="250" TextColor="Teal" BackgroundColor="##191919"/>
</Grid>
</ScrollView>.../>
